channel.title: Please help, followed guides but friend cant join
channel.description: Hello people, i am using v0id pkz source and I have port forwarded and everything but my friend(on another computer on the same internet connection) cant join. I can join using local host but my friend cant join using the ip. I have followed few guides(including moparscape guide) and still doesnt work. My friend gets an error connecting server when trying to join. Please help. Thanks

item.title: Please help, followed guides but friend cant join
item.dc:creator: @chuac44 chuac44
item.description:
@chuac44 wrote:

I cant connect with the ip on the host computer. Yes i am using no-ip and yes I HAVE opened it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 05:16:37 am[/size][hr]can anyone please help?

Read full topic
item.source: Please help, followed guides but friend cant join

item.title: Please help, followed guides but friend cant join
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Well try connecting with the ip on the computer that is hosting it and check the ports, also are you using no-ip or what?

Read full topic
